string.name: name
string.value: The Shadow Knight in Dragon's Nest
The #p9010000# says that there is some news you should know about. Click on the lightbulb over the #p9010000#'s head to hear the news!
The #p9010000# says to go through the Dimensional Mirror to get to Dragon's Nest, where you will find #p9201144#.
You spoke to #p9201144# in Dragon's Nest. He told you about some eggs you can obtain from the Dragon's Nest.

string.name: summary
string.value: Go to Dragon's Nest and look for #p9201144#.
I suppose you heard about me through the #p9010000#. It's nice to meet you.
What? You couldn't find #p9201144#? Go through the Dimensional Mirror and go to #m683010000#. You'll find him there.
